# googleforms_sheet_values (Resource)

Manages a bounded range of values in a Google Spreadsheet using A1 notation.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `range` (String) A1 notation range to write, e.g. `Config!A1:D20`.
- `rows` (Attributes List) Rows to write. Each row is an object containing `cells` (list of strings). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rows))
- `spreadsheet_id` (String) The ID of the Google Spreadsheet to update.

### Optional

- `read_back` (Boolean) Whether to read values back from the API during Read to detect drift.
- `value_input_option` (String) How input data should be interpreted. Valid values include `RAW` and `USER_ENTERED`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Composite ID in the format spreadsheetID#A1_RANGE.
- `updated_range` (String) The range that was updated, as reported by the Sheets API.

<a id="nestedatt--rows"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rows`

Required:

- `cells` (List of String) The cells in this row.
